description: This table stores an order's first and last scheduled date and time, along with the type of review notice for the expire items (i.e. let expire or review).

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the order record associated with this order.

columns.name: LET_EXPIRE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Determines the type of review notice for the former "let expire" items


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Let Expire


Review
